recipe.title: Tomato and Herb Salad
ingredients: freshly ground black pepper to taste
instructions: Make vinaigrette: In a small bowl whisk together lime juice, salt, sugar, and pepper and add oil in a stream, whisking. Cut tomatoes into 1/2-inch-thick slices and arrange decoratively on a platter. Drizzle tomatoes with about two thirds vinaigrette. In a bowl combine herbs and scallions and toss with remaining vinaigrette. Mound herb mixture on top of tomato slices.
